[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Trevor” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”80%” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/Blackhorn-Ventures-About-Us-Amanda-Rohrer-Senior-Associate-V2.jpg” alt=”Blackhorn Ventures About Us — Amanda Rohrer — Senior Associate V2″ title_text=”Blackhorn Ventures About Us — Amanda Rohrer — Senior Associate V2″ align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”HeadShot” _builder_version=”4.9.10″]

 

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Amanda Rohrer

Senior Associate

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Bio” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Amanda Rohrer joined Blackhorn Ventures part-time in October 2021 and will join as a Senior Associate in the summer of 2022 after completing her MBA at MIT Sloan School of Management. Prior to MIT Sloan, Amanda was a Summer Associate at Spring Lane Capital, a venture and growth equity firm investing in early-stage companies across the energy, transportation, food, and waste sectors. Previously, Amanda spent six years at Cambridge Associates, where she led investment due diligence that guided over $2 billion of capital commitments across the energy, real estate, infrastructure, and agriculture sectors. While there, she co-created the firm’s first sustainable real assets benchmark, the first private gender lens investment landscape, and was a founding member of the company’s LGBTQ+ affinity group.

Amanda received a B.A. in International Relations from the University of Virginia. During her MBA at MIT Sloan, Amanda held internships or conducted research projects at Social Finance, Closed Loop Partners, and Patagonia. In her spare time, Amanda enjoys backpacking and making homemade pasta with her family.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/team/” button_text=”Back To Full Team” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Team Button” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”%%41%%”]

 

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Boulder” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||”]

Based in Colorado. Click here to learn why.

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Policy
